source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	P.ProductId,
	P.ProductName,
	P.UnitPrice,
	S.InvoiceNum,
	S.Sales
FROM dbo.Products As P LEFT JOIN dbo.SalesTran As S
ON P.ProductId = S.ProductId

sink.preCopyScript:
Create Table dbo.Employees(
	EmployeeId int,
	EmployeeName varchar(50),
	Contact varchar(20)
)

activities.name: Delete file if size less then 1kb

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select DISTINCT COUNTRY,REGION From InvoiceData
order by COUNTRY,REGION

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@replace(replace('SELECT YEAR,MONTH,INVOICEID,SALES FROM InvoiceData
WHERE COUNTRY = ''COUNTRYNAME'' AND REGION = ''REGIONNAME''','COUNTRYNAME' ,variables('Country')),'REGIONNAME',variables('Region'))
